sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect,useState} from "react"; import PoisDetail from "./PoisDetail.js" export default function PoisList(props){ return( <>
Points of interest of the item :
{props.pois.map(d => (

Description : {d.description}

Category : {d.category}

Location : {d.latitude} ; {d.longitude}

Position : x: {d.mapCoordinates.x} ; y: {d.mapCoordinates.y} ; z: {d.mapCoordinates.z}

))}
); }
